GSD.description:
virtio_console: Assure used length from device is limited

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.276 by commit 187f14fb88a9e62d55924748a274816fe6f34de6. For more details please see the references link.
